一种价值 16,000 美元的新产后抑郁症药物上市了。保险公司将如何处理？一种备受期待的产后抑郁症治疗药物 zuranolone 于 12 月上市，有望成为治疗衰弱性疾病的一种方便快捷的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/A-new-2416000-postpartum-depression-drug-is-here-How-will-insurers-handle-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/A-new-2416000-postpartum-depression-drug-is-here-How-will-insurers-handle-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b72e1d5-3290-4727-8def-42e2ddd5e279 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 06:49:42 -0400 A new $16,000 postpartum depression drug is here. How will insurers handle it?

吃碳水化合物会影响面部吸引力吗？研究人员调查了高胰岛素血症和高血糖等医学疾病影响面部吸引力的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Does-eating-碳水化合物-impact-facial-attractiveness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Does-eating-碳水化合物-impact-facial-attractiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93246b85-b346-4b69-aea5-85e2bf01bf0f Tue, 12 Mar 2024 04:12:00 -0400 Does eating carbohydrates impact facial attractiveness?
新型“GPS纳米颗粒”对与肿瘤扩散有关的蛋白质提供基因冲击宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究人员表示，一种新开发的静脉注射“GPS纳米颗粒”可以瞄准癌细胞，向与肿瘤生长和扩散有关的蛋白质提供基因冲击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/New-e2809cGPS-nanoarticlee2809d-delivers-a-genic-punch-to-the- Protein-implicated-in-tumor-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/New-e2809cGPS-nanoarticlee2809d-delivers-a-genic-punch-to-the- Protein-implicated-in-tumor-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cca13c30-3660-4688-93b4-58d939fbaefd Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 New “GPS nanoparticle” delivers a genetic punch to the protein implicated in tumor spread
开发出用于触发和成像癫痫患者癫痫发作的新方法研究人员开发了一种触发癫痫患者癫痫发作并对其进行成像的新方法，使医生能够收集实时数据来定制癫痫手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/New-method-development-for-triggering-and-imaging-seizures-in-epilepsy-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/New-method-development-for-triggering-and-imaging-seizures-in-epilepsy-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ff9a26c-2436-4ea0-8dea-f59b0767ed35 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:53:00 -0400 New method developed for triggering and imaging seizures in epilepsy patients
研究强调需要持续监测新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种和疫苗弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和伦敦大学学院健康与护理研究所生物医学研究中心的研究人员强调了随着病毒不断进化，持续监测新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种和疫苗性能的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Research-highlights-the-need-for-continued-surveillance-of-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants-and-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Research-highlights-the-need-for-continued-surveillance-of-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants-and-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf5a96a-17c0-4108-9ff1-db0e5d88c038 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:50:38 -0400 Research highlights the need for continued surveillance of emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants and vaccines
可注射水凝胶介导的心肌梗死治疗的最新进展宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心肌梗塞（MI）会引发不良的重塑机制，从而导致心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Recent-advances-in-injectable-Hydrogel-Medical-myocardial-infarction-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240311/Recent-advances-in-injectable-Hydrogel-Medical-myocardial-infarction-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=728f41fb-191d-41bf-b8be-8e4d79bb9945 Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:21:41 -0400 Recent advances in injectable hydrogel-mediated myocardial infarction therapy
